mapper.insert: insert into pay_orders ( id,order_id_set, status, pay_type, total_money, fee, pay_time, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{orderIdSet}, #{status}, #{payType}, #{totalMoney}, #{fee}, #{payTime}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update: update pay_orders set order_id_set = #{orderIdSet},status = #{status},pay_type = #{payType},total_money = #{totalMoney},fee = #{fee},pay_time = #{payTime},create_time = #{createTime},update_time = #{updateTime} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id , order_id_set, status, pay_type, total_money, fee, pay_time, create_time, update_time from pay_orders where id=#{id}
mapper.update: update pay_orders set status = #{status},update_time=#{updateTime} where id = #{id}
